qna.a: Yes, DigiPLAN is completely free. You can create a group and invite others to plan events together. Tell your friends and family to join DigiPLAN!
You can invite them through their username in the upcoming FRIENDS tab.

qna.q: How do I plan an event?
qna.a: Navigate to the EVENT CALENDAR tab and click on a date. You will be prompted to enter the event's information, and after that it will be updated for the group to see.

qna.q: What should I use DigiPLAN for?
qna.a: You can use DigiPLAN for events, important dates, or even as a deadline tracker!
